name: Acid
summary: Does damage, and has a 10% chance of lowering the target's Special Defense by one stage. In Double/Triple Battles, this move affects all adjacent foes.
viability: Even in doubles and triples, this is a poor choIce of move. The added effect of Special Defense drop has a low chance, and there are generally better moves to use. Sludge Wave affects all foes, and has a base power of 95. Sludge Bomb has a base power of 90 and has a 30% chance to burn.
